name: CH?: Woods of Dawn
description:
YOU ARE HEADING TOWARDS THE TOWN YET YOU ENTERED THE WOODS OF DAWN.

A PLACE WITH FREEZED TIME THAT NIGHT WILL NEVER COME.

THERE YOU MEET MANY INTERESTING PEOPLE THAT NEEDS HELP.

Control:

Mouse Click to click, interact with Dialogue

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Hit keys (F) to interact with objects

Reminders:

Change window size that best fit.

Set page(window) size to be full screen, 80% for better  experience.

Turn on Sound for better experience.

Credit*

"Door, Wooden, Close, A (H6 MS).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Organ Ambience, Calm, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
